name: Potato on a Plate during the Irish Famine Simulator
name_original: Potato on a Plate during the Irish Famine Simulator
description:
Have you ever wondered what it would be like to be a potato on a plate during the Irish Famine?

No? 

Well you can still find out in Potato on a Plate during the Irish Famine Simulator! Use wasd or the arrow keys to dodge the mouths and  arms to survive.

A game by Artemii Safonov
